preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored CreateTable for CHUTE_TIME_LINE as table already exists.

createTable.remarks: A historical record of when the status of a chute changed.

column.name: CHUTE
column.remarks: A reference to the chute (MSMODEL.MACHINE) that this record applies to.

column.name: NAME
column.remarks: The name of the status that the chute changed to.

column.name: COMMENTS
column.remarks: The comments about the status that the chute changed to.

column.name: COLOR_RED
column.remarks: The red value of the color used to represent this status.

column.name: COLOR_GREEN
column.remarks: The green value of the color used to represent this status.

column.name: COLOR_BLUE
column.remarks: The blue value of the color used to represent this status.

column.name: OLD_NAME
column.remarks: The name of the status that the chute changed from.

column.name: OLD_COMMENTS
column.remarks: The comments about the status that the chute changed from.

column.name: OLD_COLOR_RED
column.remarks: The red value of the color used to represent the last status.

column.name: OLD_COLOR_GREEN
column.remarks: The green value of the color used to represent the last status.

column.name: OLD_COLOR_BLUE
column.remarks: The blue value of the color used to represent the last status.
